name: Terraform Static Test
on:
  workflow_call:
jobs:
  TerraformStaticTest:
    name: Terraform static test
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      id-token: write
      contents: read
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
        # with:
        #   ref: ${{ github.ref_name }}
      - uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          aws-region: 'ap-northeast-1'
          role-to-assume: 'arn:aws:iam::899541356921:role/rice01010101-terraform_basecode-ghact-oidc-role'
      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"
      - run: terraform init
      - id: tf-valid
        run: terraform validate -no-color

      - id: tf-plan
        run: terraform plan -no-color
